Name: Nuclear Daiquiri
Ingredients: 20 ml Green Chartreuse (or alternative herbal liqueur)
10 ml Chilled water omit if using wet ice
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Garnish with lime wedge on rim.
Review: A great way to inflict mutually assured destruction, although there will be fallout the morning after.
History: Created in 2005 by the late great Gregor de Gruyther at LAB bar in London, England.
Nutrition: One serving of Nuclear Daiquiri contains 170 calories
